text: This article is an episode list for the French animated series Oggy and the Cockroaches. As of June 2024, "The Magic Pen" ("Crayon Magique") is the most- viewed episode on YouTube with over 173 million views. ==Series overview== ==Episode list== ===Season 1 (1998–1999)=== ===Season 2 (2000–2003)=== ===Season 3 (2008; 2017–2018) === ===Season 4 (2012–13)=== ===Season 5 (2017–18)=== ===Season 6 (2017–18)=== ===Season 7 (2018–19)=== ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Lists of television series episodes
title: List of Oggy and the Cockroaches episodes
